scripts.lmsinit:
archive_name=`find . -type f -name '*.tar.gz'` && tar -xf $archive_name && rm $archive_name && exercise_name=`echo $archive_name | sed 's/.tar.gz//g' | sed 's,./,,g'` && sed -z -i 's/

- /

  > 

- /g' ./$exercise_name/$exercise_name-quiz-notes.md && sed -z -i 's/

## Notes/

  > 

## Notes/g' ./$exercise_name/$exercise_name-quiz-notes.md && sed -z -i 's/:

  > 

- /

- /g' ./$exercise_name/$exercise_name-quiz-notes.md && git switch -c $exercise_name && cd $exercise_name && test -f /$exercise_name/tsconfig.json && npx tsc --watch
scripts.reactinit:
archive_name=`find . -type f -name '*.tar.gz'` && tar -xf $archive_name && rm $archive_name && exercise_name=`echo $archive_name | sed 's/.tar.gz//g' | sed 's,./,,g'` && sed -z -i 's/

- /

  > 

- /g' ./$exercise_name/$exercise_name-quiz-notes.md | sed -z -i 's/

## Notes/

  > 

## Notes/g' ./$exercise_name/$exercise_name-quiz-notes.md | sed -z -i 's/:

  > 

- /

- /g' ./$exercise_name/$exercise_name-quiz-notes.md | git switch -c $exercise_name && cd $exercise_name && npm create vite@latest my-app -- --template react-ts | cd my-app && npm install && npm run dev
